description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: The unlockKey character in a lock using Sciener firmware can be brute forced through repeated challenge requests, compromising the locks integrity.

El carácter de clave de desbloqueo en una cerradura que utiliza el firmware Sciener puede ser forzado de forma bruta mediante solicitudes de desafío repetidas, comprometiendo la integridad de la cerradura.
